location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The file is arranged in chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the main foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the inside back cover with 9; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located at the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.An additional foliation sequence is present in parallel between ff 3-6; these numbers are also written in pencil, but are not circled.

mods.abstract: The file contains the following:Correspondence between Charles Dalrymple Belgrave, Adviser to the Government of Bahrain, and Tom Hickinbotham, Political Agent, Bahrain, regarding the legal specifics surrounding those whose estates in Bahrain are administered by the government due to their age or mental state, including their liability for any debts incurred through use of credit;a public notice issued by the government listing all those whose estates are administered by the Minors Department who are not legally liable for their debts.Folio 7 is internal office notes.
